pirate_login Package¶

backends Module¶

class openassembly.pirate_login.backends.CaseInsensitiveModelBackend[source]¶

Bases: django.contrib.auth.backends.ModelBackend

By default ModelBackend does case _sensitive_ username authentication, which isn’t what is generally expected. This backend supports case insensitive username authentication.

authenticate(username=None, password=None)[source]¶

tests Module¶

This file demonstrates two different styles of tests (one doctest and one unittest). These will both pass when you run “manage.py test”.

Replace these with more appropriate tests for your application.
